definition: Mangzhong or Grain in Beard, 9th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th June
awn (of cereals)/arista (of grain)/tip (of a blade)/Miscanthus sinensis (type of grass)/variant of 邙, Mt Mang at Luoyang in Henan

sentences.english: The Grain in Ear tells people that the wheat has ripened.
sentences.chinese: 芒種告訴人們小麥已經成熟了。

sentences.english: Grain in Ear, is a Mount crops such as wheat mature meaning.
sentences.chinese: 芒種，是麥類等有芒作物成熟的意思。

definition: Chushu or End of Heat, 14th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd August-7th September
Xiaoman or Lesser Full Grain, 8th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st May-5th June
Jingzhe or Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th March
the whole year must be planned for in the spring (idiom)/early planning is the key to success
pinyin: yi1 nian2 zhi1 ji4 zai4 yu2 chun1

definition: beginning of spring/the lunar New Year
old calendar/the Chinese lunar calendar/same as 農曆|农历[nong2 li4]
Double Ninth or Yang Festival/9th day of 9th lunar month
